name: Sharpshooter

grantsPowers.name: Ricochet Shot
grantsPowers.description: Attack: Multiple Enemies; Buff Critical Strike

grantsPowers.name: All Clear
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Increase Damage when apart from enemies

description: Many undervalue the beauty and simplicity of the arrow, but the truth is that a rapid firing archer is just as deadly as any other foe in combat. Long range shots allow for a quick and effective way to take an opponent down with minimal interaction.
lore: She sees her opportunity, and with a quick pull of the string the arrow speeds toward her mark. It is within seconds that he is immobilized.
